Quality / GCMS TestingTo confirm the quality and purity of our essential oils, we source our raw materials from around the world exclusively from suppliers who adhere to our rigorous quality standards. Our ingredient suppliers must pass a thorough qualification process, including GMP Compliance verification through audits and review of documentation. Every Nature's Truth essential oil is meticulously tested in various stages by our quality control experts to adhere to strict purity and quality standards. One of the many sophisticated tests our oils undergo is GC/MS testing (Gas Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry), which ensures the identity of different components within the oils. Pure Plant BasedOur essential oils are extracted from plant-based sources grown in areas where these plants are indigenous. Since there are natural variations from plant to plant, variation in lots of essential oils may occur.
